roleset.name: dress
roleset.note: ROBE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from robe.01-v)

example.name: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: Michelangelo found the rabbi [*ICH*-1] in the room of study , a gentle old manwith a white beard and luminous grey eyes , robed in black gabardine with askullcap on his head .
example.arg: a gentle old man with a white beard and luminous grey eyes
